jaca.android.tools
Class ServiceArtifact

java.lang.Object
  cartago.Artifact
      jaca.android.dev.JaCaArtifact
          jaca.android.tools.ServiceArtifact

public class ServiceArtifact
extends JaCaArtifact

Artifact that allow to interact with an existing Android Service that response at the specified action and map its interface into artifact operations.

#### Observable Properties #####

  • state(State). State = {"connected", "disconnected"}

#### Observable Events #####

  • service_connected
  • service_disconnected

Author:
mguidi
